mapper.insert: insert into sys_page(path, name, _order, parent_id, type, add_time, status) VALUES(#{path}, #{name}, #{order}, #{parentId}, #{type}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status})
mapper.select: select id, status, name, add_time, path, _order, parent_id, type from sys_page where id = #{id};
select id, status, name, add_time, path, _order, parent_id, type from sys_page;
